column2: Lethargic, heavy breathing. No obvious tumor present prior to necropsy. Head was domed.
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
Had slight popcorn lung phenotype-- probably early onset.
Skull soft and bulging before cutting open. Large tissue mass was underneath brain.
Really small potential tumor chunks in between shoulder blades.
